general.description: POEditor is a web-based software localization tool that can be used by anyone who creates an account. It does not require any software download so you can access it from any computer, wherever there is an Internet connection and a browser.
general.help:
This module offers you the way to sync the translation saved in the POEditor service.
In order to setup the module, you need:

  • POEditor Api Token

We believe in globalization, we've set no limits to the number of projects, languages and contributors you can use for your translation process. So join with us to start the translation of your language version. Click here to join
